name: Notion Beginner Manual
description: Learn how to use and understand NotionA step-by-step manual to help you go from beginner level to intermediate level in using and understand Notion.Who am I?I'm an Official Notion Ambassador and I've built over 50+ Notion workspaces for clients, customers and myself. I'm an expert in using different Notion blocks and databases and now I'm teaching you to do the same.Why did I create this manual?Notion is the future of digital productivity for both personal and business use. I want to help you be
features: I don't know where to start learning Notion; I'm unsure about what to use Notion for; I'm overwhelmed with all the options; I don't know what the different things do; I don't understand databases and complicated features; Lesson 1: Introduction; Lesson 2: Getting started with Notion; Lesson 3: Basic components of Notion; Lesson 4: Organizing your workspace; Lesson 5: Collaborating with others
